name: TangoTab

overview: TangoTab empowers restaurants to market to a targeted audience, driving traffic and loyalty to their brand. With marketing, technology, and social media tools and expertise TangoTabâ€™s platform allows restaurants to interact with guests in real time and to bring them in with enticing offers when they most need to fill empty seats. TangoTab builds relationships with the restaurants most desirable to guests, delivering a win-win experience for both.
